title: Culpables: London
overview: When Noah's mother, Ella, falls in love with the very wealthy William, the two move from America to London to live with William and his son Nick. Upon arrival, the 18-year-old Noah meets bad boy Nick, and there is an immediate attraction between the two. Noah spends the summer adjusting to her new life, making new friends from Nick's various circles, and navigating a complicated relationship with him while they fight to keep the attraction at bay. Noah will ultimately be forced to deal with her devastating past while falling in love for the first time.
